extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.lang.Runnable

                          boolean hostile)
        Adds a projectile with given x,y,speed and image to the projectile array
        Parameters:
        x - postion in x-axis
        y - position in y-axis
        dx - speed in x-axis
        dy - speed in y-axis
        img - image for the design
        hostile - if the projectile is harmful for the player
